episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4001_1:
Can you believe that the famous supermodel Elesa
is putting on a fashion show right here on Pasio?!

According to my sources, she’s so popular in
Unova that tickets to her shows sell out instantly!
Yaaay! I’m so excited!

Rumor has it there’s a Pasio photo shoot in the
works as well...

Gyaaah! What I wouldn’t give to be a Cutiefly on
the wall during Elesa’s photo shoot!

Guess you better hover around town for the next
few days then, Doc. Or the Pokémon Center.
Maybe you’ll get lucky and bump into her!

Who knows? If you’re in the right place at the
right time, you could ask her for a selfie, dude!
That’d be sick.

Y-yes, sick! Sick, indeed! As in the mere thought
of bothering Elesa with such a request makes
me ill...
So popular...
Elesa’s actually a close friend of mine!

She’s a super-tough Gym Leader, but she also
does a ton of modeling work!

Ever since she came to Pasio, we’ve been 
hanging out and chatting a lot.
Elesa sounds so cool...
I wonder if she would want to chat with me, too...

I’m sure she would! And she’s more than just cool.
She has a really quirky sense of humor, too!
Quirky?
Yeah! Like, when I saw her the other day...
Throw that misbehaving Klink in the clink!

Cofagrigus is so cool!
Don’t you *cough* agree, Gus?
That’s what she said to me! Quirky, right?
Are those...puns?

*giggle*
Elesa likes to call them jokes, but they
really are just bad puns, aren’t they?

Hehe... Maybe she’ll be easier to talk to than
I thought...
Oh, Skyla! Retelling my jokes again, huh?

And who’s this new face? I hope my friend hasn’t
been making a Muk-ery of me!
Hehe... Muk-ery.

*giggle*
I’ve got a Magne-ton more where that came
from. So, what’s your name, sweetie?
Oh, I’m...Marley. I’m a Pokémon Trainer.
Well, thanks for coming to see my show, Marley.

I hope you enjoy the glitter and glam! Have a
dazzling time!
You too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Huh? What’s all the commotion about?
Wait a sec... Oh no! Look!
Is that Team Break?!

Testing... Testing one, two, three!
Is this mic working?

All right! Listen up, everybody! This show’s
officially been hijacked by yours truly!

If you want the stage back, you gotta give us
your sygna suits, too! Hand ‘em over!

But my sygna suit is one of a kind... It was
designed to be a symbol of my bond with Rotom.

Even if I gave it to you—which I won’t—it’s not
something just anyone can wear. You could never
pull it off!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], Skyla, Marley!
Could you lend me a hand?

It’s time to show these Team Break fashion victims
how to make a battlefield sparkle!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4002_1: Wha—?! They just keep on coming!
It’s almost time for the show to start.
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4002_0:
I suppose we could... But I was thinking...
What if we go ahead and start the show now?
Why not just start the show?

Haha! I was just thinking the same thing.
Come on—let’s do it! Let’s start the show!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4002_1: Skyla, would you mind giving me a hand?

With Swanna here, the stage is just a
swoop away!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4003_1:
No way! Is that a brand-new, never-before-seen
outfit that Elesa’s wearing?!

Oh my! This new look doesn’t appear in my
database at all! I believe your hypothesis may
indeed be correct!

You may have noticed that I’m wearing a new
design today. But it’s not just any ordinary outfit!

Its designer crafted it specifically for me so that
I can shine brighter than ever before here
on Pasio...
It’s my very own sygna suit!

So thanks for coming, everyone! I hope you’re as
excited as I am about the debut of my all-new
look today!
And with that, let’s start the show!
Wha—? When did she do a costume change?!

Oh my gosh! Elesa, you look so GORGEOUS in that
sygna suit!
Hey, whose side are you on?!

Costume changes are essential to a good fashion
show. The same can be said of Pokémon battles!

The stage is my battlefield, and you’ve decided to
step into the spotlight today. I hope you haven’t
gotten cold feet.
Of course not! I’d love to battle with you!
Again, whose side are you on here, huh?!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4003_0: Yeah, it’s time to battle! Let’s have some fun!

Right! It’s time to battle! What do you say we
get this show started?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_1:
How? How are you that strong?!
And look what you did to my teammate...

Ahh... I can’t help but be dazzled by
Elesa’s brilliance...
Seriously! What did you do to her? Ergh...

Fine then! I’ll retreat for now! But I’m gonna
remember this!

Oh, totally! I mean, there’s no way you could
forget the fashion show where I made my
sygna suit debut with Rotom!
Um, I don’t think that’s quite what he meant...

Woo-hoo! We did it! Good riddance, Team Break!
Wait a sec... What’s that?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_0:
That giant arrow that just appeared on the
sign over there...

A giant arrow just appeared on that sign
over there...
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_1: Yeah, I think so! I wonder what it’s doing.

It looks like the arrow might be pointing down
at something...

Oh! You’re right! Look, there’s another Team Break
goon right where it’s pointing!
A Team Break what, you say?!

You’ve got it all wrong! I’m not a member of
that loathsome crew!

What’s that mask for then, huh? Admit it!
You’re a member of Team Break, aren’t you!
Wait, I think I know that mask...

*giggle*
I see we have a surprise visitor today!

You’ll be a tough opponent to beat, but the show’s
just getting started, after all... And there are so
many people watching us.

Getting to test out my brand-new sygna suit in a 
Pokémon battle against you would be a thrill! It’d
definitely be a crowd pleaser!

Perhaps, but as I said before, I’m not a
member of—
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_0: Let’s turn this show up to 11!
Let’s do it for the audience!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_1: O...K... I think I see what you’re trying to do.

All right, then. I hope you’re prepared for the
power I’m about to bring to this stage!
How about some applause, people? It’s show time!

Hang on a minute...
Isn’t that Will...of the Indigo Elite Four?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4005_1:
Marvelous... You’re far more skilled than I
gave you credit for.

Clad in a sygna suit, a Gym Leader from Unova
managed to unleash a power greater than
my own.

For a Team Break member, you weren’t so
bad yourself!

I had complete confidence in my ability to win...
But this time, I failed.

However, as I’ve already pointed out, I’m in
no way, shape, or form connected to Team Break.
I’m—
Will, right? Of Elite Four fame?

Correct! My name is Will, and I do happen to be
a member of the Indigo Elite Four, as a matter
of fact.

I’ve traveled all over the world on a journey to
strengthen my Psychic-type Pokémon. We train
to be the best of the best.

Since coming to Pasio, I’ve been mistaken for a
member of Team Break more times than I care to
count, and I’ve been challenged just as many.

Allow me to set the record straight here and now.
I’m NOT with Team Break!
Do you see the exquisite curves of this mask?

How could such an elegant design as this be
mistaken for what those crude bullies wear?!
Point taken...

You know, I’d heard about an Indigo Elite Four
member who conceals his face.

When I saw your mask and realized you were him,
I almost hesitated... The idea of going up against
someone so strong made me nervous.

But I wanted to test out my strength—to see
how brightly I could shine dressed in my new
look with Rotom.
In the end, we came out victorious...

But you’re seriously powerful. Your fashion
sense and battle prowess are so on point.

You decided to challenge me in the hopes that a
battle would make your show a success, and
[Name:PlayerNickname ] backed you up.

I knew that the battle had to be exciting, so as
your opponent, I made sure to funnel every ounce
of strength I had into the battle...

But I was defeated by the pure confidence that
sparkled all around you in your sygna suit...
You completely annihilated me!

Thanks, Will. That praise means a lot coming from
someone like you.

*giggle*
I guess that settles it then! Case closed!

Not so fast, Skyla. The show’s not over yet.
We’re just getting started!
Hm? What do you mean?
Skyla, Marley, Will, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...

Will you stay with me until the very end of
the show? I need your strength.
Are you seeking another Pokémon battle?

No, no! I want you and your Pokémon to help me
build a really beautiful stage!

Oh, it’s Xatu’s and my help you require. I see...
That should be no problem at all.
You can leave the catwalk to Swanna and me!
Arcanine, let’s help Elesa carry her set pieces.

Would you mind lending us a hand, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4005_0: Thank you so much! I owe you one!
Thank you so much! I owe you one!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4005_1:
All right, then. Time to return from intermission
and continue on with the show!

Come on! Let’s give this audience the most dazzling
fashion show they’ve ever seen!
